remarks: The composition of two full functors is full.  Proposition 3.30(d) in [Adamek] p. 35.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jan-2017.)
statement:
cofull.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Full D ) ) $.
cofull.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( D Full E ) ) $.
cofull $p |- ( ph -> ( G o.func F ) e. ( C Full E ) ) $.
